title: NDA Basic - Happy Path Demo
description: Demonstrates incremental question-answer dialogue with perfect information gathering. Shows basic IBDM operation with QUD management and plan progression.
business_narrative: This scenario shows how IBDM efficiently gathers all required information for an NDA through a structured dialogue. Each question is asked sequentially, the user provides clear answers, and the system maintains perfect context throughout. This demonstrates the core value proposition: systematic, transparent information gathering that never loses track of what's needed.
larsson_algorithms: Task Accommodation (Section 2.5.1) - System infers NDA drafting plan from initial request
Question Accommodation (Rule 4.1) - Each answer accommodates the top question on QUD
QUD Stack Management (Section 2.4.2) - Questions pushed/popped in proper order

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to draft an NDA
turns.business_explanation: User initiates the task with a simple command. IBDM recognizes this as a document drafting request.
turns.larsson_rule: Task Accommodation - System infers a plan for NDA drafting

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: What are the parties to the NDA?
turns.business_explanation: System asks the first question from its plan. This shows systematic information gathering.
turns.larsson_rule: Rule 5.1 - Raise issue from private.issues to shared.qud

turns.speaker: user
turns.business_explanation: User provides a clear, direct answer. IBDM extracts the legal entities and updates its commitments.
turns.larsson_rule: Rule 4.1 - Answer accommodates top question on QUD

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: Is this a mutual NDA or one-way?
turns.business_explanation: System continues to next question in the plan, asking about NDA type.

turns.speaker: user
turns.business_explanation: User selects from alternatives. System resolves the alternative question.

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: What is the duration of confidentiality obligations?

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: What is the governing law jurisdiction?

turns.speaker: user
turns.business_explanation: Final piece of information provided. All requirements now gathered.

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: Thank you. I have all the information needed to draft your NDA. The document will include: Acme Corporation and TechStart Inc as parties, mutual confidentiality, effective January 1, 2025, 3-year duration, governed by California law.
turns.business_explanation: System confirms completion and summarizes gathered information, demonstrating transparency.

metrics.dialogue_efficiency: 100% - No wasted turns, all questions answered directly
metrics.system_transparency: High - User always knows what's being asked and why
